de.coreengine.asset

Class ObjLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.suuirad.coreengine.asset.ObjLoader

  • public class ObjLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that can load a obj file and its mtl file, if exist
    Author:
    Darius Dinger

      Construct model from obj formated string arrays with vertex data

      Vertex data format:
      usemtl Next faces material
      v Vertex position
      vt Vertex texture coordinates
      vn Vertex normal
      f Indices of a face

    • Method Detail

      • loadSimpleModel

        public static SimpleModel loadSimpleModel(java.lang.String file,
                                          com.bulletphysics.collision.shapes.CollisionShape shape,
                                          boolean asResource)
        Loading a obj file into a simple model. Just the first object in the obj file will be loaded. The other discarted.
        Parameters:
        file - Obj file name to load
        shape - Collision shape of the model
        asResource - Load model from resources
        Returns:
        Loaded simple model

      • loadModel

        public static Model loadModel(java.lang.String file,
                              com.bulletphysics.collision.shapes.CollisionShape shape,
                              boolean asResource,
                              MetaModel meta)
        Loading obj file and mtl file, if exist.
        Parameters:
        file - File to load relative to application
        shape - Collision shape of the model
        asResource - Load model from resources
        meta - Metamodel to store meta data in or null to dont store this data
        Returns:
        Loaded model

      • loadModel

        public static Model loadModel(java.lang.String[] objFile,
                              java.lang.String[] materialFile,
                              java.lang.String texLoc,
                              com.bulletphysics.collision.shapes.CollisionShape shape,
                              boolean asResource,
                              MetaModel meta)
        Construct model from obj formated string arrays with vertex data

        Vertex data format:
        usemtl Next faces material
        v Vertex position
        vt Vertex texture coordinates
        vn Vertex normal
        f Indices of a face
        Parameters:
        objFile - String array with vertex data
        materialFile - String array with material data or null for default materials
        texLoc - Location of the material textures
        shape - Collision shape of the model
        asResource - Loading material textures from resources
        meta - Metamodel to store meta data in or null to dont store this data
        Returns:
        Generated model

      • convertToModel

        public static Model convertToModel(java.util.List<java.lang.Float> verticesRaw,
                                   java.util.List<java.lang.Float> texCoordsRaw,
                                   java.util.List<java.lang.Float> normalsRaw,
                                   java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> objects,
                                   Material[] materials,
                                   com.bulletphysics.collision.shapes.CollisionShape shape,
                                   MetaModel meta,
                                   MetaMaterial[] metaMaterials)
        Converting raw vertex data into model and calculating tangents.
        Parameters:
        verticesRaw - Raw vertices
        texCoordsRaw - Raw texture coordinates
        normalsRaw - Raw normals
        objects - Raw objects of the model with faces
        materials - Raw materials
        shape - Collision shape of the model
        meta - Metamodel to store meta data in or null to dont store this data
        metaMaterials - Meta material data
        Returns:
        Converted model
